job description:
KORE1, a nationwide provider of staffing and recruiting solutions, has an immediate opening for a Software Engineer.

The Software Engineer will be involved in the full product lifecycle, contributing to our core products. The Software Engineer will build data processing pipelines that ingest and explore billions of data points and matches these data points (attributes) to real consumers profiles. These attributes ensure the right consumers are seeing the right ads, translating into online and offline purchases for our clients.

What You Will Be Doing:
  • Design and develop all aspects of Viant’s data pipeline: data ingestion, validation, aggregation, and presentation
  • Build and maintain highly-scalable ETL pipelines for ingesting data from various sources/APIs
  • Create complex SQL queries and perform ad-hoc and exploratory data analysis
  • Solve complex performance problems, architectural challenges and production issues
  • Work closely with business stake holders, product and data scientists
What You Need:
  • 3+ years of professional Java software development experience
  • Solid understanding SQL, MySQL and other database technologies
  • Experience with data architecture definition, design, implementation
  • Ability to troubleshoot queries, stored procedures, functions, packages and triggers
  • Good communication skills and ability to work cross-functionally
If you are a Software Engineer with 3+ years of professional Java software development experience, let's chat today!
